abstract: University of North Carolina finds possible additional NCAA violations in women's basketball and men's soccer programs while preparing response to recent academic scandal; other college sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: North Carolina uncovered possible N.C.A.A. violations in women’s basketball while preparing a response to an academic scandal, the university said.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | College Sports; More Problems for U.N.C.

snippet: North Carolina uncovered possible N.C.A.A. violations in women’s basketball while preparing a response to an academic scandal, the university said.
